content: What is the name of the legendary city that was said to have sunk into the sea in a single day and night of misfortune?

I believe you're referring to the legend of Atlantis. Atlantis is a mythical island nation mentioned in Plato's dialogues "Timaeus" and "Critias," where it is described as a powerful and advanced civilization that was destroyed by a catastrophic natural disaster and sank into the ocean in a single day and night. However, it's important to note that Atlantis is considered a fictional place by most historians and scholars, as there is no concrete evidence to support its actual existence.
